title: Doria
body:
The noble Genoese Estevão Anes had a daughter named Leonor Doria, who married Rui Gonçalves Velosa, and they were the ancestors of this ancient family in Madeira.

Dornelas. V. Ornelas.

Estevão Anes: Noble Genoese, father of Leonor Doria
Leonor Doria: Daughter of Estevão Anes, married to Rui Gonçalves Velosa, giving rise to the Doria family in Madeira
Rui Gonçalves Velosa: Husband of Leonor Doria, with whom he originated the Doria family in Madeira
